name: Type 'em Up
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Write the words on the enemies to destroy them.
  • Write the letters on the bullets to destroy them and charge your abilities
  • Some enemies are protected by a shield! Use an ability of a different type than the shield to disabel it. Ex. (Blue/water shield, use orange/fire or yellow/thunder)
  • To use an ability, type the word written on top of the bar (Blast, Bubble, Thunder)
  • Case sensitive! Be aware ;P

Comment your thoughts about the game and share your best punctuation!

Game developed under 48h for the Mix and Game Jam 2020

According to the theme "mixing genres": Shoot 'em up + Typing

TIP: If you find it extremely difficult, try ignoring the shielded spaceships and focus on the projectiles with numbers.

My current record is 19k:
